scripts.doc:
bash -c "node ./doc/script/docSchemaHelper.js && dot -Tpng -o doc/generated/assetModel.png doc/generated/assetModel.dot || (echo 'Unable to generate assetModel.png as part of schema documentation, you should install dot from https://graphviz.org or you may skip the pre-commit hook with:
SKIP=doc git commit' && false)"
